description:
As Kei suffers through horrific experiments at a government lab, Tanaka urges him to unleash his dark side. Meanwhile, Sato plots a rescue mission.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: But When It Comes Down to It, You Still Want Them to Help You... You`re the Worst Kind of Trash...
Iza to Nattara Tasuke o Motomeru Saitei na Kuzu
Tu comptes sur eux pour t`aider tu es une ordure de la pire espèce
いざとなったら助けを求める最低なクズ
